type.name: org.gradle.jvm.application.scripts.TemplateBasedScriptGenerator
type.description: Interface for generating scripts with the provided details based on a provided template.

method.name: getTemplate
method.description:
Gets the template reader used for generating script.

returns:Template reader

method.name: setTemplate
method.description:
Sets the template text resource used for generating script.
param:template Template text resource

property.name: template
property.description:
Gets the template reader used for generating script.

returns:Template reader
